startup.name: Tinfoil Security
startup.product_desc: Tinfoil Security is providing the simplest security solution. With Tinfoil Security, your site is routinely monitored and checked for vulnerabilities using a scanner that's constantly updated. Using the same techniques as malicious hackers, we systematically test all the access points, instantly notifying you when there's a threat and giving you step-by-step instructions, tailored to your software stack, to eliminate it. You have a lot to manage; let us manage your website's security.

startup.name: Tinfoil Security
startup.product_desc: Tinfoil Security is providing the simplest security solution. With Tinfoil Security, your site is routinely monitored and checked for vulnerabilities using a scanner that's constantly updated. Using the same techniques as malicious hackers, we systematically test all the access points, instantly notifying you when there's a threat and giving you step-by-step instructions, tailored to your software stack, to eliminate it. You have a lot to manage; let us manage your website's security.

startup.name: Assured Labor
startup.product_desc:
VentureBeat – “Assured Labor, a mobile LinkedIn for the developing world”
FastCompany – “Assured Labor is the first digital marketplace for jobs optimized for the way that people in emerging markets find jobs.” 

Assured Labor revolutionizes hiring in emerging markets. The service leverages the power of mobile phones and the internet to rapidly connect employers with the best hourly candidates in their area.

Over 200,000 candidates and 4,000 employers in Mexico. We're about to launch in Brazil.

startup.name: MixRank
startup.product_desc:
Over 3,300 businesses have joined MixRank since our July launch.
We just came out of beta and have been growing revenues by 44% a week.

We save performance advertisers huge amounts of time and money by showing them exactly how to target their display advertising campaigns.

By tracking millions of ads daily, we can automatically recommend ad copy and targeting opportunities that are likely to perform well for our customers.

The product is live at http://mixrank.com
startup.high_concept: Spy on Competitors' Display Ads (YC S11)

startup.name: UserVoice
startup.product_desc:
UserVoice is the only tool companies need to deliver great customer service.

We excel in the 3 most important areas for any web business: collecting (and responding to) customer feedback, quickly dealing with support issues and automatically deflecting common questions.

Our combination of community and helpdesk in one simple solution is what our customers love.

Our unique focus on killer UX for agents and end-users alike is why we're the tool that you'll want every company on the web to use.

startup.name: Zaarly
startup.product_desc: Zaarly is a proximity based, real-time buyer powered market. Buyers make an offer for an immediate need and sellers cash in on an infinite marketplace for items and services they never knew were for sale.
startup.high_concept: Zaarly is a proximity based, real-time buyer powered market

startup.product_desc: Zaarly is a proximity based, real-time buyer powered market. Buyers make an offer for an immediate need and sellers cash in on an infinite marketplace for items and services they never knew were for sale.

startup.name: Kaggle
startup.product_desc:
Kaggle is the leading platform for predictive modeling and analytics competitions. Companies and researchers post their data. Statisticians and data miners from all over the world compete to produce the best models.  Kaggle's 23,000 users reliably beat existing benchmarks within days or weeks.

Kaggle's clients include Allstate, NASA, Wikipedia and the Heritage Provider Network, sponsor of a $3m health prize.  Kaggle's latest challenge enhances gesture recognition for Microsoft Kinect.

startup.name: Signpost
startup.product_desc:
Signpost is a leading online advertising startup that connects local businesses with customers. Some people say that Signpost is creating the Google AdSense of local commerce, and to that extent it currently powers monetization campaigns for over 1,200 local publishers that range from mobile apps to directory services to daily deals sites. 

Signpost puts businesses in control of their marketing by providing them with a suite of tools that drive new customers and bring first-time visitors back.

startup.name: iSuggest
startup.product_desc: iSuggest is a cloud service that helps businesses get real-time feedback and suggestions from their customers in a private way. Unlike sites such as yelp, feedback from customers is delivered privately and directly to the store management. Our value proposition is that we help businesses solve customers problems privately before they become public in the form of reviews and have a dramatic negative affect on the business. Consumers use the iSuggest mobile app to leave feedback for any business.
startup.high_concept: iSuggest solves the disconnect between local businesses and consumers

startup.name: TactusMD
startup.product_desc:
Workflow based electronic health record, specifically geared towards Pediatricians, OB/GYNs and Family Practitioners.

Unlike other so-called workflow based EMRs, TactusMD EHR provides the "workflow of workflow".  Every practice is different, ways of practicing medicine can vary widely, so why would anyone want to use an EMR that makes them fit into a cookie cutter mold?  They wouldn't!  That is where TactusMD comes in.  Our physicians are able to customize the product to suit their needs!

startup.name: Shag
startup.product_desc:
I propose here is very cheap and promising model. Touch screen is not here, because my phone is used in the sensor input is better and cheaper.  The production of such a sensor should not exceed $ 3.
Video cameras are located on each side, the photos to a new level of art. You are shooting  reverse side . You can also take pictures the usual way, "one eye" is simply holding the device like an old Kodak.
This means that the assembly will not be expensive. It can be fully automated. No huge runs.
startup.high_concept: It's time to replace all the push-button phones!

startup.name: Dropmysite
startup.product_desc: We run two sites: Dropmysite.com and Dropmyemail.com. They are both focused on backing up your data on the web (Websites & Emails). In the future we plan to focus on B2B email backup as well as other business communications.
startup.high_concept: Website, database & email backup in the cloud

startup.name: Fullerene Solutions and Services
startup.product_desc:
Fullerene Solutions and Services Private Limited is a innovate and technological platform that develops solutions to explore, experience and adding value to your life , run by the Students and Alumni of the Indian Institute of Technology. 
Our Group Ventures
DateIITians (www.dateiitians.com)
Cogxio (www.cogxio.com)
iWantTutor (www.iwanttutor.com)
Assignment Support (www.assignmentsupport.com)
eStudyCorner (www.estudycorner.com
BestClassify (www.bestclassify.com)

startup.name: Verbify
startup.product_desc:
The ways we find, interact, and consume websites and services have remained largely unchanged over the years.  Browsers render faster, mobile devices have more apps, but we still adhere to a model where every website or service has its own unique way of organizing information.

What if we presented a new model of web interaction - one that allowed users to complete tasks with a service or across a variety of services, in a more usable, efficient, and social manner?
startup.high_concept: Evolving the user experience for web interaction

startup.name: Storytree
startup.product_desc: Storytree makes it easy for new parents to capture the special moments of their child's life using their iPhones. We effortlessly create a beautiful timeline where they can add milestones, reminisce, and privately share those special moments with family and close friends. Our mobile app is paired with our iPad app for sharing and beautiful consumption. Our iPhone app has been featured by Apple twice, we've been featured in the New York Times, on TBS, and selected as a finalist for SXSW 2012.
startup.high_concept: Path for your child - from pregnancy to college

startup.name: Listener Approved
startup.product_desc:
Listener Approved is a musical web and mobile app that’s on a mission to free music. We provide independent musicians with a platform that features everything they need to promote themselves and share their works of art with listeners around the world.

At Listener Approved we put the power of recommendation in the hands of the listeners; we completely rely on them to determine each artist’s talent who we then highlight by aggregating their track to the top of the charts according to how the listeners vote.

Listener Approved prides itself on providing listeners with highest rated music from any genre, or location, and the tools they need to stay in tune with their favorite musicians.
startup.high_concept: Where artistic creation and listener response meld to form the sound of eternal revolution

startup.name: UrtheCast
startup.product_desc: Working in an exclusive relationship with world-famous Russian Aerospace giant RSC Energia, UrtheCast is building, launching, installing, and operating two cameras on the Russian module of the International Space Station. Starting in late 2012, video data of the Earth collected by our cameras will be down-linked to ground stations around the planet and then displayed in near real time on the UrtheCast web platform or distributed directly to our exclusive partners and customers.

startup.name: FeeFighters
startup.product_desc: FeeFighters (http://feefighters.com) is the best place to comparison shop for payment providers. We aggregate the pricing rules of top payment providers and conduct instant reverse auctions to get the best price for each customer. Then we help them commit to a provider, taking a revshare. We're now coming into the marketplace with our own product Samurai (http://samurai.feefighters.com), an all in one merchant account + gateway with simple pricing and API. Now both devs and finance guys <3 us.

startup.name: Magnifis
startup.product_desc: Robin is your personal eyes-free assistant on the road, now available on Android. Robin provides drivers with relevant information, guidance and content via a natural voice / gesture interface. In the car, this KITT-like interface becomes key, enabling a completely eyes-free interaction: voice in, voice out. Robin's powerful dialogue engine allows a natural and smooth conversation flow, always keeping track of the implied context. See http://angel.co/magnifis#press for more.
startup.high_concept: Meet Robin  - your personal eyes-free assistant on the road

startup.product_desc: Robin is your personal eyes-free assistant on the road, now available on Android. startup.name: ClearFit
startup.product_desc:
We created an app that fixes hiring.

... because hiring is broken: turnover and retention haven’t improved in over 30 years.

ClearFit is the only online solution that makes it easy for anyone to find job candidates and predict their success.

It takes 5 minutes to set-up, helps find candidates, and our patented engine predicts employment success 5x better than traditional hiring techniques. 

Free trial, or low flat fee (included in the cost of a job posting).

5,000+ businesses use ClearFit.

startup.name: HavaBet
startup.product_desc:
HavaBet brings the experience of betting in the pub with your mates to your mobile.

We are building a global platform for users that enjoy a friendly bet on their sporting passions (4m adults per year in the UK alone)

Because we reach the bettors that sportsbook cannot, we can partner with multi-national operators to create exclusive offers for our users which also reduces the user acquisition cost for sportsbooks.

We also help to better monetise other large online sports properties.
startup.high_concept: The craic of betting with your mates in the pub is coming to your mobile

startup.name: AngelList
startup.product_desc: AngelList is a platform for startups to meet investors and talent.

startup.name: Rock Stocks
startup.product_desc:
Kickstarter+Wahooly+AAA

RockStocks is a crowdfunding platform for musicians that creates another level of engagement by creating a game that revolves around putting money into bands that will be the next big thing.

startup.name: Door 6
startup.product_desc: Atmo is an evolving multi-player role-playing-game for Apple and Android phones and tablets, where users will explore space and build their own spaceship. For now it is a competitive game of Capture The Flag, IN SPACE.  An in-game economy surrounding the parts and plans to build your ship will be the primary revenue stream. Atmo is built on top of our own cross platform game engine.

startup.name: Gravytrain
startup.product_desc: GravyTrain is a game developer for Facebook and Mobile Apps. The Company is creating games that encourage consumers to use their minds in creative ways while interacting within their respective communities. The first game, imthnkngof, is launching 12/15/2011, with 3 more games right behind it. The Company has an agreement with a celebrity to help launch the app.
startup.high_concept: Creating games that encourage consumers to use their minds

startup.name: Tiny Post
startup.product_desc: Tiny Post is like a visual Twitter. Take a photo, write three lines, share with others. Download the iOS app: http://tinypost.co/
startup.high_concept: Tiny Post is like a visual Twitter. Pictures become stories.

startup.name: Mappin
startup.product_desc:
Mappin is your destination journey planner. 
Mappin finds you the best end-to-end routes for your journey, by searching through all combinations of transportation. By calculating your carbon footprint, we optimize our search results to reveal the Fastest, Cheapest, or most Carbon-Friendly route options.

PLUS, Mappin utilizes a loyalty platform for rewards and give incentives for eco-friendly behaviors.

startup.name: anupzone
startup.product_desc: Its a website which provides all your needs. You can download all types of songs. You can upload your own story through youtube direct. Many other things to download like windows shell themes, wallpapers and others. you can watch various videos. You can create your own blog through wordpress. You can solve your problem through forum section.

startup.name: Heroic
startup.product_desc:
Heroic, Inc. is the eHarmony for home services. With a few simple questions, Heroic calculates the best person for a job in categories including house cleaning, lawn care and handymen services. 

Combining online referrals from friends and neighbors with a proprietary matching technology, Hero Match, Heroic is the simplest means for time-crunched, young families to hire reliable, home service professionals. 

BeHeroic.com

startup.name: Tiny Post
startup.product_desc: Tiny Post is like a visual Twitter. Take a photo, write three lines, share with others. Download the iOS app: http://tinypost.co/
startup.high_concept: Tiny Post is like a visual Twitter. Pictures become stories.

startup.name: Global AMP
startup.product_desc: Global AMP assists artists with selling their music, create press kits, networking with labels, and connect with listeners. Listeners have an opportunity to listen or buy fresh new music daily... but it goes much deeper than that. This is a network revolving around all things music. The current and future functionally is vast.

startup.name: Shopo.in
startup.product_desc: Shopo is the marketplace for everything with an Indian heart.  By that we mean its the place where you will find contemporary and traditional Indian designer, handcrafted and home made stuff, and their creators!
startup.high_concept: The Marketplace for everything with an Indian heart!

startup.name: www.booka.me
startup.product_desc: We help the SMB market monetize their facebook "likes" and twitter "followers".  And we help fill their unbooked appointment times.
startup.high_concept: We help the SMBs monetize thier facebook page "likers" and twitter followers

startup.product_desc:
Kickstarter+Wahooly+AAA

RockStocks is a crowdfunding platform for musicians that creates another level of engagement by creating a game that revolves around putting money into bands that will be the next big thing.

startup.name: SourceNinja
startup.product_desc:
SourceNinja prevents problems in applications that use open source. 

SourceNinja notifies developers when updates are released or problems occur. Issues we prevent include license changes, security vulnerabilities, and performance problems.

SourceNinja offers a product for individual developers and large enterprises.

- 80% of commercial products contain open source software.
- 47% of developers don't know if their open source is out of date.
startup.high_concept: Windows update for the application stack (AngelPad S11)

startup.name: VoteForce.org
startup.product_desc:
Easy to use, powerful set of tools to give ordinary citizens a bigger voice in their political system.

Easy to use, powerful marketing tools for elected officials to engage with their constituents. 

Create a bi-directional platform for candidates, lobbyists, elected officials, activists, ordinary citizens to engage with each other on a regular basis. Democracy every day, not just once every four years. Provide elected officials with real time feedback from their constituents.

startup.name: Wigwamm
startup.product_desc:
Wigwamm aims to be the centre of the world for property.

Our exchange enables transacting property to be as liquid as trading stocks. 

We will drive traffic and conversation with a beautiful property browsing experience and an event every Monday night.

Value proposition: achieving 'best price' for landlords and agents, not just the first price in the door.

startup.name: Gizmo
startup.product_desc:
Gizmo gives brands, agencies, and independent creatives the ability to engage their consumers on multiple platforms. Consumers expect your brand to be on as many platforms as they are, however management at scale is nearly impossible. Gizmo solves this by centralizing creation, publishing, and management of all these platforms, from the cloud.

Gizmo is currently in beta with Fortune 100 companies, and large ad agencies. Our pre-beta product was monetized to $105k in early revenue.

startup.name: Mixpanel
startup.product_desc:
Mixpanel is the most advanced analytics platform ever for mobile & the web. We help our customers track product usage, measure conversion rates, and analyze user retention.

Our products are powerful, beautiful, and easy to use.
startup.high_concept: The most advanced analytics platform for mobile & web.

startup.name: ShowMe
startup.product_desc:
ShowMe is an open learning community you can learn or teach anything.

Over 1.5 million lessons have been created using the ShowMe Interactive Whiteboard iPad app, ranging from algebra to calculus to cooking.

There are millions of great teachers out there; ShowMe empowers them to share their knowledge and teach the world.

startup.product_desc:

Over 1.5 million lessons have been created using the ShowMe Interactive Whiteboard iPad app, ranging from algebra to calculus to cooking.

There are millions of great teachers out there; ShowMe empowers them to share their knowledge and teach the world.

startup.name: iBuildApp
startup.product_desc:
Last decade was the era of the website.  This decade is the era of mobile app.  

Over the last few months, over 200,000 apps were created using iBuildApp’s patent pending app creation and publishing PaaS.  These apps have been downloaded over 10M times.
Anyone can build a native or web-app for iPhone, iPad or Adroid using simple drag and drop.  Build your own app for free:  iBuildApp.com.  No coding required!

Follow us or ask for an Intro.
startup.high_concept: The Biggest App Building Service: 60K apps created!, 2.5M Active Monthly Users
